name: aura-break

effect.sun-moon: While this Pokémon is on the field, dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: While this Pokémon is on the field, dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: While this Pokémon is on the field, dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.

short_effect: Makes dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.
